192.168.41.48/28

      192.168.41.48 => 11000000.10101000.00101001.00110000

/28 255.255.255.240 => 11111111.11111111.11111111.11110000


11000000.10101000.00101001.0011 0000
11111111.11111111.11111111.1111 0000

network address  =>11000000.10101000.00101001.00110000 =>192.168.41.48

no. of subnet bits = 28-24(default class c)=4 bits

number of subnets =2^4 =16

no. of host bits remaining available =8 (default)- 4(subnet bits)=4

number of host available for each subnet =(2^4) -2=16-2=14

first host address =     11000000.10101000.00101001.00110001 =>192.168.41.49

last host address  =     11000000.10101000.00101001.00111110 =>192.168.41.62

previous subnet mask of current subnet= 11000000.10101000.00101001.00100000 =>192.168.41.32

next subnet mask of current subnet =    11000000.10101000.00101001.01000000 =>192.168.41.64

boardcast address =    11000000.10101000.00101001.00111111 => 192.168.41.63

previous ip address => 11000000.10101000.00101001.00101111 => 192.168.41.47

next ip address =>     11000000.10101000.00101001.00110001 => 192.168.41.49
